Summary: White Orb hovering in same spot
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around June 2nd 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was up hiking in what is known as Cherokee park, near the Wyoming border and I looked up at a plane leaving a contrail, and noticed that the trail abrubtly started dissapating in one spot, in this spot a white orb appeared and hovered in the exact spot for approxiamately 20 minutes and then vanished.
